message:
－
Foreign Firms Stand Warned Over Imports From KTS’s Roundtree Group
http://www.sarawakreport.org/2014/09/foreign-firms-stand-warned-over-imports-from-roundtree-group/
新聞大意：馬來西亞砂拉越 (Sarawak) 地區，一間惡名昭彰的家族企業（KTS）雇當地人盜伐木材，賣到很多國家去，然後各國的進口商都宣稱自己的木材是可持續性的。這間家族企業是華人的，而臺灣有沒有哪間廠商有進口？如何追查呢？

－
木材追追追－Sarawak to Taiwan
https://g0v.hackpad.com/Sarawak-to-Taiwan-oqsXADzMrp8
story: Che Wei Liu shared a link to the group: g0v.tw 後勤中心.
description: A raft of foreign companies, many of whom tell their buyers that their wood is 'sustainable', stand warned today that these claims are impossible to verify and that their supplier the KTS owned Rou...
name: Foreign Firms Stand Warned Over Imports From KTS's Roundtree Group
caption: sarawakreport.org

data.message: 財政部關稅總局 2011 「木質材料進口國家與材積當量」資料顯示，馬來西亞是台灣主要的木質材料進口國。
我國木質產品消費項目與流向
